pr_title: fix[aws-datastore] selection set for nested custom types

timeline.message:
fix[aws-datastore] selection set for nested custom types

This PR fixes a bug in the selection set invovling fields of custom types.

Resolves: https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-android/issues/702
check for custom type checks against the generic type if collection
